ComicInfo.Summary:
Picking up from where we last saw her, Robyn is in a battle for her freedom with a unit of robots designed specifically to take her down. It's Robyn vs the Vigilante Hunter Squad, as she hopes her smarts and skills will be enough to help her walk away from this battle. Our archer will be put to the test against this new type of robotic foe, but will she prevail!?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Igor Vitorino & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Sheldon Goh & Hedwin Zaldivar | 2 | C | Cover C | Michael Dooney & Ula Mos | 3 | D | Cover D | Martin Coccolo & Mohan Sivakami | 4 | E | Holiday ZENBOX Cosplay Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 150 | Keith Garvey | Missing | F | Staff Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 25 | Unlisted | Missing | G | VIP Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 200 | Mike Krome (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing |
